modName: Male full body mesh and underwear
summary: Two sets of meshes that replaces the loincloth on the naked male body.
descriptionHtml:
These are two sets of meshes that replaces the naked male body. The first one is a full mesh of the male body and the other one is a male body mesh with boxers-like shorts that is using the prisoner pants textures. I made the meshes by editing the Bethesda male body mesh.

These meshes should be compatible with texture replacements that are intended for the Bethesda's male body meshes.

How to install:

Just unpack the archives on your Skyrim's Data folder.

How to Uninstall:

Delete the malebody_0 and malebody_1 nif files inside the "Data\meshes\actors\character\character assets" folder

Issues:
The male body textures for the khajiit has some gaps, it will look bad on the fullbodymesh version but not as much on the underwear replacer version. I am unable to fix that since I have no idea how to make the proper adjustments on the normal map for the khajiit body textures. Sorry,

FAQs:

Q: I've seen that boxer's mesh already in another mod, did you use that?
A: No, I edited Bethesda's prisoner clothes (prisonerrags_1.nif specifically) to make the mesh included in this mod.
author: chobibo
